casebody.data:
GMAC
v.
VECCHIONE. No. 265P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Nina G. Kilbride, for GMAC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of June 2008 by Defendant for "Petition for a Discretionary Review Supreme Court Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
